name: Jelly Jail
description:
Fight off waves of angry slimes and discover powerful treasures to escape from your detainment in the Jelly Jail!
This was made for a game jam hosted by a couple friends (Duration: 1 week).

WASD to move, Mouse to Aim, Left-click to fire, ESC to pause

Works best on 1920x1080

Credits:

Arissa Guard - Animation, Rigging, UI Assets

Jo Holcom - Programming, Audio Implementation

Logan Pomper - Level design, Modeling, Textures

Fonts

Ravie Font - wfonts.com/font/ravie

Rubik Font - 1001freefonts.com/rubik.font

Music
